Outbox View\n\n Long Press on a Message to Select and Send

"You are about to be presented with a series of permission requests. 
All permissions are essential to make this app work as intended. 
If you block any of the permissions the app cannot run and will exit. 

Explanations for the permissions: 
1. Access Fine Location: The GPS is used for showing accurate time when not in a cellular location. 
2. Bluetooth and Bluethooth Admin: To send and receive the modem audio via a Bluetooth device. 
3. Write External Storage: access to the app's directory on the SD card (internal or external) for storing messages and images. 
4. Record Audio and Modify Audio Settings: To capture the audio from the internal or external microphone and adjust the settings. 
5. Internet: for displaying and receiving data from the HTML forms used by Flmsg. 
6. Broadcast Sticky: to have sticky notifications so that the modem service is kept going in the background. 
7. Read Phone State: to disconnect the Bluetooth interface when receiving a phone call. Telecommunication regulations generally forbid connecting a person to the telephone network or to do so without a warning. 

If you have previously denied some critical permissions, you will have to go back to the Device's Settings/Apps and re-allow the missing permission."
Cannot send messages in current mode. Please change mode.
Please Use the Menu then the Exit option to close AndFlmsg
Press the Back Button twice in a row to return to the list

Sorry, but this is a pre-defined form (Hard Coded in Flmsg) and it cannot be transferred this way. Only Custom Forms can be transferred using this method.
Templates View Screen \n\nLong Press on a Template to Create a New Message based on that Template
Use Gallery To View and Share
Warning! This is for sharing the raw Form ONLY. To save the typed data as a message, use the buttons at the bottom of the form. Proceed with sending the RAW Form (No data)?
